root.name: Wings Over Vietnam
root.description: OverviewWings over Vietnam is based on the major air battles of the Vietnam War, from the large scale bombardments of North Vietnam in 1967 during Operation Rolling Thunder to the departure of American forces 1973. CampaignWings over Vietnam has three campaigns: Operation Rolling Thunder, Operation Linebacker and Operation Linebacker II. Players select which campaign they will be in as well as select which branch of the military and which squadron to fly with. Missions are randomly generated, and players are only able to fly with the U.S Air Force, U.S Navy and U.S Marine Corps. AircraftA-4 SkyhawkA-6 IntruderA-7 Corsair IIB-52 Stratofortress*B-57 Canberra* F-4 Phantom II F-8 CrusaderF-100 Super SabreF-105 ThunderchiefMiG-17 Fresco*MiG-19 Farmer*MiG-21*O-1E Bird Dog* *Non-flyable.
